## Lists

### Bulleted lists
* Item 1
    + sub-item 1.1
    + sub-item 1.2
        - sub-sub-item 1.2.1
* Item 2
    + sub-item 2.1
    + sub-item 2.2

### Numbered lists

1. Item 1
2. item 2
    i) sub-item 2.1
         A.  sub-sub-item 2.1.1

### Checklist

- [ ] Task 1 (unchecked)
- [x] Task 2 (checked)
